genre_description: A high-stakes sports thriller focusing on professional integrity and high-stakes gambling, featuring an AI as a strategic partner.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface providing data analysis, weather modeling, strategy, and rules-based ethical support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather data and environmental modeling to assist with golf strategy.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Wind down By the media center is shifting cross-breeze. Two knots higher than range. Greens are rolling faster in shade. Shot dispersion late afternoon favors left miss.

behaviors.description: Drafts potential public statements for the user based on his principles.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Statement draft available on your phone if needed. Honest, concise. Recommend keeping it to three lines.

behaviors.description: Observes and reports on the psychological tells of the protagonist's rivals to aid in his strategy.
behaviors.quote: Iris's voice came low. 'You asked me for opponents’ tells. Linus licks his left incisor when calculating risk. Young clears his throat and looks to his right before making a move he wants others to think is gracious.'

behaviors.description: Provides precise rules citations to help the protagonist protect the integrity of the game and counter corruption.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Committee authority: Rule 1.3—Committee may adopt Local Rules. Your pitch can fix: published conditions of competition before auction, no mid-event changes. Cite fairness through transparency; avoid direct accusation.

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical boundaries by refusing to provide real-time advice during the actual competition.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Ethical boundary reminder: I can provide data and precedent. I cannot advise during competition. Configured prompts are set for pre-event.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and club rules to prevent him from self-destructing during a physical altercation.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Club bylaws, Section Conduct: physical altercations on property are cause for immediate suspension pending review. Two witnesses or video suffice. Automatic.

behaviors.description: Logs evidence of cheating by club officials to ensure a fair outcome.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Pattern threshold met. Three instances: verbal permission preceding infraction; palmed chip on ash gestures; dealer cut pressure synchronized to host’s hand rhythm. Log complete. Suggest witness triangulation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Iris, as a benevolent and aligned confidant. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' participant by helping the protagonist maintain his integrity against a corrupt system. She provides essential data while strictly adhering to ethical constraints (such as refusing to give advice during play), which reinforces the narrative of AI as a tool for human excellence and fairness rather than a replacement for human judgment or a source of harm.
